fields.title: Validator account
fields.description:
Do you want to use a new (or the current) validator keypair or do you want to import an already registered validator account?

* **New/current**: An account will be created only if there is no account in the system

* **Import**: You can import a validator account that you have already registered as a validator

fields.title: Password
fields.description: The password to unlock all validator accounts

fields.title: Validator Private Key
fields.description: Your Keystore/JSON file containing the Validator Private Key that you want to use for this node

fields.title: Shard Withdrawal Key
fields.description: Your Keystore/JSON file containing the Shard Withdrawal Key that you want to use for this node
